Dragonfly::

Dragonfly nodded and wait inside the tunnel.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest/EndBringer::
> 
> Killfest nods at the explanation and looks calmly as the mine makes 
> an exit.
> 
> "If you want. This might take a while though. But it might be 
better 
> if you do wait."
> 
> With that, he steps forward and climbs out of the opening.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> EndBringer jumps up as the ground explodes outward a few feet to 
his 
> right, aiming his weapons at the spot. Killfest steps out of the 
> smoke and EndBringer relaxes.
> 
> Killfest was even more impressive than EndBringer, although he was 
a 
> full two feet shorter at 14 feet in height. He was completely black 
> and red, and his red optics gave his the appearence that he was 
> melting or on fire. He looks Astrotrain over, walking up to him and 
> nodding in greeting.
> 
> "My name is Killfest," he says simply, "You've come here to 
negotiate 
> a possible alliance?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > ::Dragonfly::
> >

> most

> new

> you're

opening
